# init(issuerData:signature:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns a new add-passes view controller with the issuer data, and signature you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(issuerData: Data, signature: Data) throws
```

## Parameters

- **issuerData**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object that represents the issuer data.
- **signature**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object that represents the issuerâ€™s signature.

## Creating an add-passes view controller

- **init(pass:)**: Initializes and returns a newly created add-passes view controller with a single pass.
- **init(passes:)**: Initializes and returns a newly created add-passes view controller with an array of passes.
